content: Some functions, such as the Left, Right, or Match functions, need a string of text in order to work, as opposed to a number or date. In order to do this, you can follow these steps:Create a new variableAdd the object that you want to turn into a string of textAdd a Plus sign and two quotation marks to the formulaThis will convert the variable to a string of text and let you use any text related function.
title: Apricot Results | Converting a Date or Number to a String of Text
